content:
I've included four of the value-sets developed and published via mcovid.org into the Saner IG, but there's some things the IG publisher doesn't like about them (no errors, just warnings).

  1. They don't have a description.
  2. The name is not computer friendly

I also don't like the fact that while they have name for the computer, they are missing a title (in fact, what is now name should be title, and name should be a transform from title to a computer friendly value, camel-case, pascal-case, or _ separated words would be fine.
cc: @Mark Kramer
